page.title: 12EDUCATION 2
page.content: Every year we have a Burns' competition which consists of reciting Burns' poems,solo singing,accompanying and playing a musical instrument.In P7 there is a literature exam. After the competition we perform a concert for the old folks.Some people recite Scottish poems,some play the piano and some play the recorder. We have inter-house competitions.One of them is the General Knowledge Quiz. Others are rounders,football, tug-o-war,flat,novelty and relay races.The three houses which compete in these matches are Brownlee, Mauldslie and Milton.The house captains are picked from P7 and they choose the teams for the quiz and the sports matches.
